title: Ngozi Okonjo-Iweala | Education, History, Biography, World Trade Organization, & Facts | Britannica Money

quotes: Okonjo-Iweala did not become a U.S. citizen until 2019.
In 2020 the president of Nigeria, Muhammadu Buhari, nominated Okonjo-Iweala for the position of director general of the WTO.
The necessary consensus of WTO members was finally achieved in February 2021, when the incoming administration of U.S. Pres. Joe Biden announced its support for Okonjo-Iweala.
